text: Lindsey Ann German"London candidates announced", Evening Standard (This is London), 14 May 2004 (born 1951) is a British left-wing political activist. She is a founding member of the British anti-war organisation Stop the War Coalition. She was formerly a member of the Socialist Workers Party. German ran twice as a left-wing candidate for Mayor of London. ==References== Category:1951 births Category:Living people Category:British activists Category:Politicians from London
title: Lindsey German
